home.subtitle: Discover a youtube channel about a manifesto for a fairer, more resilient and sustainable society. We also create popular education workshops
home.welcome: A gateway to a new world...

intro.1: The year is 3000. Lady H Society, a historian, is investigating some missing archives: there are no traces of what happened from years 2022 to 2500.
intro.2: In 3000, humans live in peace, and have evolved enough to join the Galactic Worlds Organization.
intro.3: With this manifesto, discover Lady H's world, her investigations into our present day and into the missing archives!

2.subtitle: You want to be a part of the discussion? to participate in our workshops? to provide feedback?
2.name: Reach out!

3.call: Where does all this come from?
3.name: Learn more...

mission.subtitle: Learn more about our objectives, how this youtube channel started and our team

comic.title: The starting point of the manifesto
comic.subtitle: Drawings by Elodie Schnitzler

obj.intro: This manifesto is a personal world view based on my experiences and these of my closed ones. It is therefore biased and bound to evolve over time and include your feedback. My objective is to remain as scientifically correct as possible, to separate facts from personnal opinions, and to welcome your contributions.

content.2: Dive into the roots of the problems
content.4: Create a community of discussions and collaborations

manifeste.subtitle: Find here the links to episodes and explainations about the themes

intro.1: Discover the manifesto through the graph below, you can play with the themes, move them around.
intro.2: If you click on a sphere, you'll see its relationship with other themes.
intro.3: To see things better, you can hide some sets of themes by clicking them in the key
intro.4: Below you can find the links to episodes.

description.1: For each theme, you'll find links to:
description.3: A podcast episode about an interesting person's life

team.2: Art&Fact: video production / music / mise en scene

workshops.title: Cocreate or participate in our workshops
workshops.subtitle: These workshops are open to all. We want to cocreate them with you! To learn more or participate, go to the contact page

content.1: We watch one or several episodes, then we do a moving debate or an open discussion
content.2: We create drawings, stories, musics... to illustrate Lady H Society's world in year 3000
content.3: We discuss critical thinking, science, dialogue, and how to create your own world view
content.4: We discuss orientation, how to start a project, social entrepreneurship, obstacles, successes...

contact.title: Don't hesitate to reach out
contact.subtitle: To be a part of the discussion, to participate in the podcast, to provide feedback...
contact.legal: The data collected on this website include and are limited to the data you provide through the contact form. This data will never be shared outside Lady H Society. The data is stored in a secured computer for up to 2 years, for the purpose of creative development of the project. In accordance with the GDPR, you can ask to receive a copy, modify or delete your information at all time -send the request through our contact form.
